General.Name: Rajdarshan Industries Limited
General.Description: Rajdarshan Industries Limited engages in trading of quartz grit and powder, and consumables used in production of quartz stone in India. It also trades in minerals. The company was formerly known as A.R. Enterprises Limited and changed its name to Rajdarshan Industries Limited. Rajdarshan Industries Limited was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Udaipur, India.
